yoruba: Ìwọ̀n eku nìwọ̀n ìtẹ́; olongo kì í gbé tìmùtìmù.
gold: The measure of the rat is the measure of the nest; a robin does not live on a cushion.
gen:
Yoruba: Ìwọ̀n eku nìwọ̀n ìtẹ́; olongo kì í gbé tìmùtìmù.
English: The size of the rat determines the size of the trap; a cat doesn't catch what is too small.
